QuestData.Title: My Town, It's On Fire Again
QuestData.Description: I don't know if you noticed, but my town is on fire... again.$B$BWe have water buckets all over town, but no one can get out to put out the fires. Please, please, help us!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Mistfall Water Buckets to douse 60 fires.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mayor Shiyo at Mistfall Village in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
